attributes.action: Tidy the streets of unnecessary traffic lights and signs...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you seen you street ruined by unnecessary sets of traffic lights and signs, Is a metal forest growing near your home?? What massive amounts of energy is wasted on the lights where in reality the old T junction was fine??
Yes some Traffic lights and signs are needed but many are not and are targets for vandals. They then cost the tax payer a fortune to replace.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
